meanings.definition: Used to represent the sound of a loud impact or explosion.
meanings.sent1: Kapow! The thunder made me jump.
meanings.sent2: Kapow! The balloon burst with a loud noise.
meanings.sent3: Kapow! The book fell off the shelf and startled me.
meanings.sent4: Kapow! The news hit me like a sudden explosion.
meanings.sent5: Kapow! The fireworks lit up the sky with a loud bang.

meanings.definition: An exclamation used to emphasize the suddenness or force of an action or event.
meanings.sent1: Wow, kapow! That car came out of nowhere.
meanings.sent2: Ouch, kapow! I accidentally hit my toe on the table.
meanings.sent3: Yikes, kapow! The surprise party shocked me.
meanings.sent4: Bam, kapow! The news hit me like a sudden punch.
meanings.sent5: Zap, kapow! The lightning struck the tree with a sudden force.
